headline.main: Americans Gain Nine Miles In Push Through North Sicily; Capture Nine More Towns as German Flank Is Believed Decisively Turned -- British Breach Axis Line Near Catania

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Aug. 1 -- American troops sweeping forward through German defenses in northern Sicily were reported tonight to have captured nine key towns, and it was believed that the Americans had probably turned the German flank decisively on the north coast.
abstract: US troops capture 9 more towns in drive against Ger defenses, northern Sicily
